name: decom_vpa_omitted_defaults_to_one
description: With DECOM enabled, VPA with omitted row defaults to row 1 relative to scroll-region top
comment: DECSTBM(2,4) creates region rows 1-3. DECOM on homes to (1,0). CHA(4) sets col 3. VPA with omitted row defaults to row 1 within the region, so print X at (1,3).
